title: JosephPerez80
author: JosephPerez80
content: Hello friends!  My name is Joseph, and the other day I got the idea to create a platform about cryptocurrencies, NFTs, AirDrop, DeFi and much more.  I have already taken my first steps, here is my website: https://cryptoinsight.pro/.So far, the site publishes daily news from the world of cryptocurrencies, but I want to develop it further and write various guides and analyzes of different crypto projects.I’d be glad to hear your opinion and advise on what you’d personally want to see on Cryptoinsight.pro. All feedback will be taken into account in the further development of the site.Thank you in advance!

comments.author: Techdev
comments.body: Please reach me on Telegram...I can offer a few ideas. @EllyElllyliosReal

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: JosephPerez80 on September 09, 2022, 11:49:47 AMSo far, the site publishes daily news from the world of cryptocurrencies, but I want to develop it further and write various guides and analyzes of different crypto projects.A simple google search reveals that all the content on your website is blatant plagiarism from the Cointelegraph news portal. Who gives you the right to steal other people's work and present it as your own without giving credit to the original authors?"Ford prepares to enter the Metaverse with virtual automobiles and NFTs"original source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/ford-prepares-to-enter-the-metaverse-with-virtual-automobiles-and-nfts"Polygon CSO blames Web2 security gaps for recent spate of hacks"original source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/polygon-cso-blames-web2-security-gaps-for-recent-spate-of-hacks"Animoca confirms $110M round led by Temasek, plans new acquisitions"original source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/animoca-confirms-110m-round-led-by-temasek-plans-new-acquisitions
